Based on world-renowned psychological research,
analyze your personality across 6 scientific dimensions.

persona.title: Celebrity Match

share.title: Share Results
share.description: Easily share your results with friends

selectVersion.title: Choose Test Type
selectVersion.description: More questions provide more precise analysis results

hexaco.title: What Are the 6 Personality Types?
hexaco.description: The 6-Type Personality Model is developed by Canadian psychologists. It adds Honesty-Humility to the traditional Big Five model for more precise personality measurement.

vsMbti.sectionDesc: The 6-Type model is a more precise, scientific personality model than MBTI.

version.detailedDesc: Most comprehensive and accurate personality analysis

slider.hint: Drag the slider to select your agreement level.

result.title: Your 6-Type Personality Results
result.matchDescription: Five people closest to your personality profile
result.hexacoBanner: Unlike MBTI, this test quantifies 6 personality factors on a 0–100 scale, providing a scientific analysis focused on self-understanding.
result.mbtiRefDesc: Estimated from 6-type scores and may differ from actual MBTI. The core analysis is the detailed 6-factor breakdown below.
result.regionMatchesDesc: Famous people with personalities similar to yours, suggested by AI

H.high: You are sincere and fair, valuing moral principles over material gain.
H.low: You actively pursue your interests and care about social status.

E.high: You are emotionally sensitive and form deep bonds with others.
E.low: You are emotionally stable and remain calm under stress.

X.high: You are sociable and energetic, gaining energy from being with people.
X.low: You are quiet and introverted, enjoying time alone.

A.high: You easily forgive others, avoid conflict, and are cooperative.
A.low: You express your opinions strongly and don't hesitate to criticize when needed.

C.high: You are organized, goal-oriented, and act according to plans.
C.low: You are flexible and spontaneous, not bound by rules.

O.high: You are creative, curious, and seek new experiences.
O.low: You are practical and prefer traditional approaches.
